column2: laŭdáte eum in firmamènto virtútis ejus. ^ Praise ye the Lord in his holy places~
column3: praise ye him in the firmament of his power.

column2: laŭdáte eum secùndum multitúdinem magnitúdinis ejus. ^ Praise ye him for his mighty acts~
column3: praise ye him according to the multitude of his greatness.

column2: laŭdáte eum in psaltério, et cìttara. ^ Praise him with the sound of trumpet~
column3: praise him with psaltery and harp.

column1: 4 ^ Laŭdáte eum in tìmpano et choro~
column2: laŭdáte eum in chordîs et órgano. ^ Praise him with timbrel and choir~
column3: praise him with strings and organs.

column1: 5 ^ Laŭdáte eum in cìmbalîs bène sonántibus~
column2: laŭdáte eum in cìmbalîs jubilatiónis. ^ Praise him on high sounding cymbals~
column3: praise him on cymbals of joy.

column1: 6 ^ Omnis spíritus laŭdet Dòminum. Allelúja. ^ Let every spirit praise the Lord. Alleluia.
